Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that allows two students to communicate over a distance.
The student can show the use of string as a tool to transmit sound between the two students.
The student can represent the sound traveling from one cup through the string to the other cup.
The student can demonstrate how people communicate using sound when using the string telephone.
The student can label parts of the drawing to show how the string telephone works, including the cups and string.
The student can illustrate how the design solves the problem of communicating over a distance using sound.
